attributes.review: My friends and I were playing truth or dare and one of them dared me to get this app. I thought nothing of it, thinking they were only trying to shake me. As I was downloading it however, I started hearing strange voices whisper-shouting in my ear, â€œwall...fired...â€ and other vague sounding things. This, thankfully, ceased when it started to install, and I thought it was the end of it. A week ago was day one of getting this app. Within the first few minutes, I started to get a strange feeling that something was off. The first night I slept with my phone on my bedside, I started getting strange texts with odd messages and calls with heavy breathing and the faint sound of the national anthem. I donâ€™t know who it comes from as it is anonymous, or what they want. On the second day my parents noticed my paranoia, and claimed it was nothing. I said it was quite the contrary. I even went as far as to show the several missed calls from the anonymous number, but I found nothing. They didnâ€™t believe me, obviously. At night the noises from my calls have escaped to the hallway in front of my room, to inside my room, and eventually to my left ear on sleepless nights. I even awake, on the rare occasions that I get sleep, in a cold sweat to the noises coming from my nightmares. I couldnâ€™t bear to keep my phone next to me at night, so my parents at least allowed me to keep it in their room. But every night I found it back there, by my bedside. After that I have multiple times tried to throw it away, but time and time again it returns back to me. I had decided that I would try to stop the problem from the source, this app. I have tried to delete it not one, not 10, but 23 times over the past few days, but with no fruition to my efforts. Then I took matters into writing this. Please. Please, if you are reading, this is a cry for help.
attributes.title: Hoeible

attributes.review: This has to be one of the worst and dividing apps I have ever seen? This is a presidential platform? Where are the kids in cages and apologizes to all of the lives lost? I thought Iâ€™d find some medical advice on how to keep my family safe and how to improve our lives by voting for him. I think heâ€™s trying to kill all of us.
